ac: 15, touch 10, flat-footed 15 (+5 armor; +4 dodge vs. giants)
special_attacks: +1 on attack rolls against goblinoid and orc humanoids, channel negative energy 3/day (DC 11, 1d6), destructive smite (+1, 6/day)
other_gear: masterwork scale mail, light crossbow with 20 bolts, masterwork greatsword, wooden unholy symbol, 94 gp

spells.cleric spells prepared:
(CL 2nd; concentration +5)

1st-bane (DC 14), magic stone, magic weapon, true strikeD

0 (at will)-bleed (DC 13), detect magic, detect poison, read magic

D Domain spell; Domains Chaos, Destruction

sections.body:
Before Combat The cleric casts magic weapon.

During Combat The cleric uses destructive smite as often as possible.

Base Statistics Without magic weapon, the cleric's statistics are

Melee mwk greatsword +4 (2d6+3/19-20).
sections.name: Tactics

sections.body: The dwarven war priest serves the god of strength, and uses her divine powers for the glory of war itself.

name: War Priest
skills: Knowledge (religion) +5, Perception +4 (+6 to notice unusual stonework)
will: +6; +2 vs. poison, spells, and spell-like abilities
